# Test Samples

Minimal committed sample files (<100KB each) for offline CI testing.

## Contents

- `simple.txt` - Basic text file (to be added)
- `simple.md` - Markdown with headers (to be added)
- `simple.pdf` - Digital-native PDF (to be added)

## Purpose

These files enable test runs without network access. See `sources.yaml` for
the full test document registry used in comprehensive testing.
